Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 1983...
Injured on 8/18/1983 with a Torn Tricep Muscle, out for entire career...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1985...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1985, going 4-2, 1.26...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1986, winning 2 games with a 1.02 ERA...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1986, going 5-0, 2.04...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1988, going 5-1, 1.90...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1989, going 7-0, 3.08...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1989, going 6-1, 2.37...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1990, going 5-0, 2.56...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1990, going 6-0, 1.13...
Injured on 10/3/1990 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 7-8 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1991, going 6-0, 1.49...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1992, going 7-0, 0.78...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1992, going 6-1, 1.68...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1992, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Won Cy Young Award in 1992, going 31-3, 2.26 ERA...
